title: ConvertXtoDVD v5.1.0.11 (2-click run)(Registered)
description:
No need for serials and cracks to get the full version, (already done it for you).
No unnecessary registry changes. 
No boring installation of tool-bars in your browser or other unwanted things.
You can even run this torrent from an USB-Stick.
Easy Uninstall with the Windows control panel.
Choose where you want to put the files on your PC. 
These are a few things that makes a 'Easy Run' version a better version.

If everybody seeds, you will get higher downloading speeds.

DESCRIPTION:
Convert videos to DVD and watch on any DVD player. Automatically burn to DVD after conversion. Excellent and fast converter. Convert AVI, MKV, MOV, Divx, WMV, MTS/M2TS, MPG, MP4 and more to DVD. Create menus & chapters, cut videos, total customization with live preview.


Edit your project with the various settings and features listed below:

-Create menus with videos and music
-Preview window / Integrated video player for live preview
-Cut unwanted parts of the video
-Add chapters - automatic or custom
-Many subtitles formats supported, convert soft or hard-coded
-Convert NTSC to PAL and vice-versa
-Merge function - like for CD1 + CD2
-Rotate video, modify brightness and contrast settings
-Compatible with any disks
-ISO output available
-NTSC + PAL region formats
-16:9 widescreen + 4:3 fullscreen
-Burn multiple copies
-VSO burning engine included
-Various SD resolutions available
-Custom output size
-Burn to DVD/USB key or store on PC

Additional/Advanced features:

-2 pass encoding for enhanced quality
-Hardware decoding for faster conversion
-Video/Audio/Subtitle synchronisation
-Various audio output formats
-Image resize filters (lanczos, linear, cubic, etc.)
-Multiple encoding profiles
-Option to shutdown computer when finished
-Multi-core processor optimized
-Audio amplifier
-Padding and cropping
-De-interlacing
-Batch converter
-Multiple conversions processed simultaneously
-Quality advisor

--------------------------------------------------------------------------

WHY UPGRADE?

- 0007484: [Bug] conversion failed (cedric) - resolved.
- 0007482: [Suggestion] only ejects when you press ok on dialogue after successful burn (cedric) - resolved.
- 0006880: [Feature Request] Restore Output and Image Setting info lines in log (cedric) - resolved.
- 0007296: [Bug] Source folder not deleted after burn process even if option is enabled (cedric) - resolved.
- 0007438: [Bug] 'do not convert dts to ac-3' setting not respected (cedric) - resolved.
- 0007447: [Bug] 2 pass conversions do not work and 2pass does not appear in log (cedric) - resolved.
- 0007461: [Information] unnecessary parenthesis in log file (cedric) - resolved.
- 0007437: [Bug] output folder created in default location instead of custom working folder set by user (cedric) - resolved.
- 0007385: [Bug] problems in Output tab (cedric) - resolved.
- 0007478: [Suggestion] change default shadow color of subtitles to black (cedric) - resolved.	

Installation instructions:
1. Execute the .exe file.
2. Follow the instructions.
3. Enjoy the program.
